document_data.mainbody:
ogarr was a member of the Flaming Fist who served the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Togarr was a human woman with a fair skin, and gray eyes. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist a helmet, a set of chainmail, and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. She wielded a halberd.
In the , Fist Togarr was stationed in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, where she patrolled the streets near the Blushing Mermaid.
